thread.title: Couple combines faith, bull-riding in ministry
thread.title_full: Couple combines faith, bull-riding in ministry

author: VICTOR TEXCUCANO vtexcucano@dailysentinel.com
title: Couple combines faith, bull-riding in ministry
text:
Victor Texcucano/The Daily Sentinel Christian Cowboys 
Karen and Bill Shaw stand by their feeding cattle on Wednesday. The couple recently bulit a bull riding arena in their backyard, which they plan to put to use along with the Christian Cowboys Who Care Ministry, which they've run since the early 1990s. Starting Oct. 6, they plan to host a free steer and bull riding practice every first and third Tuesday of every month at 6:30 p.m., along with a free meal and a short church service. Posted: Tuesday, September 29, 2015 10:41 pm | Updated: 10:08 pm, Wed Sep 30, 2015. Couple combines faith, bull-riding in ministry By VICTOR TEXCUCANO vtexcucano@dailysentinel.com
